tasks.name: Add error handling for synthesis agent failure that still captures working agent session ID if available
tasks.report: Error handling: falls back to working agent session if synthesis fails, always writes completion marker, initializes output files on start

tasks.name: Modify provider initialization to read from `notifications.json` and only enable configured providers

tasks.name: Add fallback chain: workstream config (`work/notifications.json`) -> global config (`~/.config/agenv/notifications.json`) -> defaults
tasks.report: Implemented fallback chain: if repoRoot provided, loads work/notifications.json via loadNotificationsConfig(); otherwise falls back to ~/.config/agenv/notifications.json via loadConfig(). Both use built-in defaults for missing fields.

tasks.name: Add `buildPostSynthesisCommand(options: PostSynthesisOptions)` function to opencode.ts that runs working agent first, then synthesis after
tasks.report: Added buildPostSynthesisCommand() with PostSynthesisOptions interface. Implements post-session synthesis: working agent runs first with TUI, then exports session, extracts assistant text via jq, runs synthesis headless with --format json, and resumes WORKING session. Deprecated buildSynthesisRunCommand() with @deprecated JSDoc pointing to new function.

tasks.name: Implement shell script flow: run working agent with TUI  find session ID  export session  extract text via jq  run synthesis headless
tasks.report: Added buildPostSynthesisCommand() with PostSynthesisOptions interface. tasks.name: Update session capture logic in handleSessionClose to focus on working agent session ID (synthesis session not stored)
tasks.report: Updated session capture logic in handleSessionClose to focus on working agent session ID. In post-session synthesis, sessionFilePath contains the working agent session (not synthesis). Updated comments to reflect the new approach while maintaining backwards compatibility for workingAgentSessionPath.

tasks.name: Remove or update comments referencing "synthesis wrapping working agent" to reflect new post-session approach
tasks.report: Updated comments in multi.ts, fix.ts, and threads.ts to reflect post-session synthesis approach. Changed 'synthesis wrapping working agent' to 'post-session synthesis' where working agent runs first with TUI, then synthesis runs headless after completion.

tasks.name: Verify notifications still fire after synthesis completes (synthesis output available in temp file)
tasks.report: Verified notification behavior: completion marker fires after working agent completes (notification tells user they can resume session), then synthesis runs headless. Synthesis output IS available in temp file when handleSessionClose runs (on detach), which is when output is captured. This is correct design - notify when interactive work is done.

tasks.name: Add integration test or manual verification that working agent TUI is visible during execution
tasks.report: Added 7 integration tests for buildPostSynthesisCommand verifying: 1) Working agent runs BEFORE synthesis, 2) Working agent uses TUI (no --format json), 3) Synthesis runs headless with --format json, 4) Session resume opens working agent session, 5) Working session ID stored in session file, 6) Synthesis output captured, 7) Correct mode displayed. All tests pass.

tasks.name: Remove references to "wrapper" or "nested" execution from all documentation
